law.catch_line: Payment for livestock purchased by market agencies or livestock dealers.
law.text: Payment for livestock purchased by market agencies or livestock dealers shall be made in full compliance with requirements under the Packers and Stockyards Act, 7 U.S.C. secs. 181-229b and regulations promulgated thereto.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 9, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 1(1) to (4).
